title: Smartwatch Station Clock
summary: A pretty watch face for all who love the German or Swiss railroad station clock.
description: A pretty watch face for all who love the German or Swiss railway station clock.Please note the realistic stop of the seconds arm on the full minute - like in reality.Works with round and squared smart watches.*** This app is dedicated to the birthday of my precious :-) ***NOTE: You need a SmartWatch for using this app.
descriptionHTML:
A pretty watch face for all who love the German or Swiss railway station clock.
Please note the realistic stop of the seconds arm on the full minute - like in reality.

Works with round and squared smart watches.

*** This app is dedicated to the birthday of my precious :-) ***

NOTE: You need a SmartWatch for using this app.
comments: Looks great Would love an inverted color scheme for this one.
I love the railway second hand delay like the real railway clock. The style could be a bit closer to the one on facerepo.
recentChanges: Einfach auf die Konfigurationsseite der Watch gehen und zwischen "Linear", "Smooth" und "Hard" wählen!
Just select "Linear", "Smooth" or "Hard" in the settings screen of the watch.
